title: Alex den Braber
deck: My wife Lucy and our two children, Rebecca and Oliver, moved from east London to Acomb in 2010 before having our third child, Samuel, in 2014. I commute to work in Leeds and often coax colleagues into jogging along the canal during lunch. When I'm not a taxi driver for the family, you may also see me jogging around York engrossed in some podcast. At Gateway I lead a Lifegroup with Lucy.
